Hi, can someone please tell me how to restore the network manager indicator applet to the top bar?
just right click on it and click add to panel
you'll have to manually re-start the network manager applet
is it possible that you don't have the notification thingie on your panel?
if you try to add the notification area back, you might have to try running nm-applet again
you could also try running like stalonetray or something and then running nm-applet to see if it pops up there
but you'd have to install that first
